entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: Hagrid is the gamekeeper at Hogwarts and has been trying to civilize Grawp.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is a friend of Harry's who is mentioned as being part of Hagrid's attempts to civilize Grawp.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is a friend of Harry's who is mentioned as being part of Hagrid's attempts to civilize Grawp.

entities.name: grawp
entities.description: Grawp is a giant that Hagrid has been trying to civilize.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character and is mentioned as being with Hermione and Ron.
